lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so other cool things to talk about: all of tonight's donations are going towards the Extra Life charity. The Extra Life charity is a drive that's part of the Children's Miracle Network Hospitals. A lot of great people in the community have been supporting this and we're supporting that tonight. So any donations tonight will go to Extra Life. Also over the next two days, we will also be streaming here at Geek and Sundry doing a lot of other charity events for the Extra Life charity drive, including a small DND game-- some of us-- on Saturday evening with the Vox Moronica crew. So that should be fun. Come check that out! Oh, Dungeons and Dragons, the official Wizards of the Coast folks are also doing their Extra Life stream over the next 48 hours. They're just going to be doing live DND streams as well. So starting tomorrow at noon through Sunday at noon, just constant DND on the Wizards of the Coast stream as well. And all of that is going to be raising money for Extra Life. So you'll have a lot of things to keep you busy this weekend essentially. So there's that. Also, we have New York Comic Con coming up in just a couple of weeks. Excited about that, for all you guys. We have panels on Saturday. Do we have times for those yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Between 1:00 and 4:00 is when we're doing stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hang out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll have prints!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly! And then on Sunday, outside of the convention, because we know a lot of the badges were snatched up before this announcement even happened and a lot of the Critters aren't able to make it to the actual con. On Sunday, we're looking around midday. We don't have a time or location determined yet, but that will be up on Twitter soon. It's going to happen. We're going to have an offsite Critter meetup. Where we're going to all be able to be there, hang out with you guys and catch up, sign stuff, say hi, and have a good time. So watch Twitter. If you don't follow us on Twitter, do it, because we'll have those announcements coming up very soon. So excited about that. Liam, you wanted to announce--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks like nobody else's and has a good history in game dev as well. Created Darksiders with his company, Vigil Games, that he helped found. And now he has founded Airship Syndicate, and they're making an RPG in the style of JRPGs that you've loved in your lives. But also with Joe's ridonkulous art style. So go get on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! Thank you, Liam. Orion, you wanted to say something real fast as well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. Greetings and salutations, everyone! Last week when Kit was here-- Hi Kit, we miss you! We went to It's a Wrap over in Burbank, California. Me and Liam and Laura and Marisha and Kit and her hubby. We were there and saw this robe, and I think Marisha and Laura were like, try it on, and I was like, okay. And I tried it on and was like, oh my god, it was made for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Tiberius robe you always knew-- or didn't know you wanted.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, totally, I was like, oh my god, and Liam tweeted a picture about it, and then I was streaming on my stream on Twitch and somebody mentioned the robe. And Michael Bauman-- thank you again, I'm going to thank you on Critical Role for-- he donated $400, which was the cost of the robe, and then he just wrote in the chat, this is for the robe, so I'm wearing the robe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find many cool excuses to have that robe be displayed and utilized in many ways. I'm pretty sure he hasn't taken it off since he got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it smells really bad, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome! Anybody else have any other announcements before we get this party started?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like cheese.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis likes cheese, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good announcement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, everybody!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all come to consciousness. Breakfast is prepared by the servants of the keep. As you all wake up, start getting your meals and gathering what you want to do for the day, two individuals have not come down for their meal. Lillith and Percy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Good morning, everyone!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not everyone. We're missing two. A male and a female.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy was upset.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe he needed some comforting.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I see. Are you saying they're having relations?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not saying that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perhaps we should check on them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should totally check on them!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, but if there's a sock or a gun on the doorknob, don't go in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or a ribbon. She wore a ribbon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I was thinking last night, Grog, that we're probably going to be here for a little bit before going anywhere. Do we go anywhere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to go see Uriel.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Who? Oh. Right! Yes! Also, I really want to see Allura. For no particular-- actually for very specific reasons. Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he's lying.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: One of them is: I want to pick up one of the Earrings of Telecommunication. It has been finished for quite some time. We just have to go to where she resides to pick it up. Then one of us could have another one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That robe just takes it to a whole new level!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it really does.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I feel so good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm somewhat entranced.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm telling you, it's helping, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I feel a little tingle from my belt? And can I roll for a beard check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, beard check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six. Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wake up, realizing that the morning has transpired. You reach up and grab. And what you guys notice as he comes up is there is a dark charcoal smear across one side of his face where facial hair would once be, to match the other side that is currently beautiful quaff and shining in the dapples of morning light that come through the keep window.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know the remedy for it, you just turn your face in the looking glass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, from this angle you look amazing Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My god, I'm so handsome. Right? And then just horror. Sheer horror.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (poof) A little dust and fix that for him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so it looks normal again? I like it! Yeah. Beautiful. Don't touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The color's a little off, but it looks better than not having it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In my head you're like those Mr. Wooly magnetic toys when you're a kid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would shave it and get it even, but let's be honest, given history, it's going to take care of itself soon enough. These things don't live very long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go upstairs and see if our guest, Lillith, is all right. I don't want to disturb Percy just yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You head to the guest room. You have one guest room upstairs that was among the rest of the rooms that you guys had constructed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) They're going to be getting it on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You knock on the door. A moment passes. No response.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lillith? Are you with Percy? Lillith?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You knock a second time and the door (creaks) opens a little bit. It has not really been locked or closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I peek my head in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You peek in and look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you check for traps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Already off! No. As you peek into the room, the lights are dimmed. What little bit of candles are in there are already down. Glancing in, the sheets are clean and set, the bed's been made, and there is a small piece of parchment that is folded on the edge of the bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go and read it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Read it? It reads, "Vox Machina, thank you all for your hospitality and protection through "this past evening. I would stay, but the longer I remain, the more danger I am in, and as such, put "all of you in as well. I shall travel across the Ozmit Sea to seek the guidance of my cousin Zahra, "in hopes of finally getting out from under my sisters' baneful gaze. Nevertheless, I wish you "all the finest of journeys, and I hope we meet again soon. Lillith."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's so cute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I liked her bow. It was cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tell everyone that she's gone. Gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she's in Percy's room! Scanlan, let's go see if he's banging!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run up and Percy's room is-- the door is already partially ajar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (boom)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It bursts open. (wham) Slams on the side of the door, looking in the room. He's not there, is the first thing you notice. However, what you do see are a series of different books of sketches and designs and half-concocted blueprints for different things are crumpled and torn across the room. The bedsheets are thrown off the bed. It looks like the room has been continuously tossed through some sort of frenzied action, either seeking something or just out of emotional frustration. This room is left in far more disarray than you're used to seeing true to Percy's character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My god, Grog. Percy's a hoarder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or he's in serious distress.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's the previous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The hoarder?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We must find him, don't you think? Our friend's in trouble. I proceed down to his tinkering lab. Doesn't he have some sort of lab downstairs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My room's like shit, and I'm not in trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that goes with your character.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a small slider eye vent where you can peek through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I reach the eye vent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you leap hard enough and catch it on the edge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I boost him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking inside, you can see, the forge is aglow. You hear the tangs of metal being hammered against the anvil, and you can see the form of Percy framed against the backlighting of the forge. He's feverishly working away on some sort of project.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he naked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's working too hard. Maybe we should just leave him be. Seems focused, driven, like a madman.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. I get it. Like a madman?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point a voice rings out from across the room: Percy unmoving, still continuing his work, shouts over his shoulder, "Please, leave me be. I have a lot to think about right now."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like a meal brought down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm fine. Thank you. Really. I need some time."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just in the future! But not now. That seems low priority.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stops his banging, walks over and scribbles something on a paper, then goes back to banging. "Noted." (clanging)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I drop Scanlan and I lean in and I go, beware the water! It burns!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Yes, it does, Grog. Good boy."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. So we go back up. Tell the fellows, Percy's in a mood. He's creating right now. I think we should just leave him be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understandable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let him get it out of his system.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm really worried about him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Matthew? Rolling-- 12. I'm just trying to teach my pet something but I rolled a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I want it to follow. To follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a bit of balking frustration that perhaps you've overstepped a little bit, and Lockheed feels maybe there's less of a friendship here more than a real master-servant relationship, at least in this moment, and does not seem to be receptive to your attempt.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He's in a mood, also. Why is everybody in a mood today?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. Percy's hate-smelting downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy has good reason to hate-smelt. He seems rather disturbed that the Briarwoods got away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: \MARISHA: Out of curiosity, did anyone else hear him-- did anyone else just happen to hear what he said in that fight last night?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was a little bit preoccupied by watching him shoot a servant boy over and over and over again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was after that, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? No, spit it out. What did he say? It seems important.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hard to say. You know Percy. I don't know where he gets these lines.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it fuck? Is it shit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cock! Bulls! Dong! Wang!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Steampunk!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeez. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Donkey wang!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is getting really off subject.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to go down to my laboratory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The first stuff is fairly average. But yeah, "Your "soul is now forfeit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a good line.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a really good line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thought he was just trash-talking. You think there's more to it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought it was maybe a line and then it seemed really aggressive and strong and specific, so it made me think a lot. I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you ask him about it at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We haven't seen him since that happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, do you think his Pepperbox is-- what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he's not telling us everything, that's for sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we all have some secrets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. But screaming, "Your soul is now forfeit?" That's not a secret. That's saying you peed the bed when you were a kid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I worry, too, but he did lose his entire family.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did pee the bed when he was a kid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am assuming. But he lost his entire family to those people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. But he wasn't screaming this at the Briarwoods. He was screaming this at a random mercenary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe his soul is forfeit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Death?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we keep an eye on Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a fair point, though. We'll keep an eye on him. He seems to be in a fragile state right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy's not the one who killed a poor old woman, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we kill her? I thought we just made her sleep and then walked away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. No. Total massacre.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius destroyed her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tiberius, you killed an old woman?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm not there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's actually another thing I wanted to talk about. That was also really intense. You know, I get it. It was a hard day. It was a hard day, and we tend to get a little aggressive sometimes after hard days. We've all been there. But he didn't just murder an old woman. He chainsawed her. A sleeping, unconscious woman.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was pretty great!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you saying that we should take it down a notch? Or maybe not brutally destroy the bad guys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You also were the only other one who seemed to be confused as to what was going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shot her. I shot her in the back. Let's be honest. I didn't chainsaw her, but I did shoot her in the back as she was running away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I made her go to sleep. That was peaceful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was aiming for her shoulder, if it makes any difference.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She did have that sweet little run, which was so cute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you taking moral exception to some of our behavior?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're so much better at the words than me. I don't think I even knew that's what I felt until you said it just now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, this is something perhaps you should pray on and think on. If there's something you'd like us to change about our behavior, we can consider that. We're all friends. We're allies here. We should pay respect to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just don't want us to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a fair point. We don't want to be corrupted by the very evil that we mean to stamp out in this world. She was trying to kill us. But your point is taken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was a really old woman.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But she wasn't the secretary. She was trying to kill.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. But she was unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She actually didn't do anything, either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she didn't really do anything at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She could have been taking notes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She had a wand!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Defenseless, running away. She was fleeing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. You know, this is constructive criticism, and we'll take it as such. And I, for one, will maybe not desecrate and denigrate bodies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just beds! And temples. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know! I mean, I see what Keyleth's saying, but I don't really want to cramp your style, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'll shit on things. Maybe not people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're like the A-Team, and that's your specialty. I don't really want to-- See, you should just shit when you feel the urge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is it? Do we need to be getting to Uriel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, what time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's probably pushing on 11 am, close to noon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably be getting to the palace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, what did you say you were doing down there? What did you say you were doing down in your laboratory?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I was doing my research on that stuff last night and this morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your which one?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's just my ability because of my class. I do the backstory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your backstory is?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I am a noble sage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there's a noble and there's a sage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, I know, and I spliced them because it made sense. No. The noble part is the RP. The sage is the perk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Gotcha. That's good to know. All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I was writing down the sigil to the keep. That's completed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do also know the stake in the heart is also considered to be a way to destroy them. It does not actually destroy them, but it does render them paralyzed and has to be done when they're in their resting place, within their coffin and/or the dirt that is considered their resting location. Usually that is the beginning step: to find and locate where the vampire is resting, stake in the heart, and then carry the body to sunlight or rushing water. And that's how they're permanently destroyed. You also find out that if a vampire is thought to be killed under any other circumstances, the body turns to mist and is nigh invulnerable and eventually finds its way back to wherever they've hidden their resting place to recover within a very short period of time, making them extremely dangerous, unless you have the right situation, the right conditions, to bring them to that point. So that information is now at your disposal.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to tell us what you've learned?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I did it right this time! Knowing that, I take some files and-- I want to check if I can-- Nope. I can't do anything yet. That's it. I'm going to go upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you guys have gathered the time and what you might be, going forward, doing for the rest of the day, Tiberius comes upstairs with a bit of a smile and an air of confidence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good, you're back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Friends to the emperor. We want to figure out what we're doing here. Do we want to be just powerful badasses who walk around getting what they want, or are we trying to enact some positive change in this world?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, absolutely. That's what my items are for. I've only found one of them. There are still three or four, if they even exist out there. There are countless things to go and venture forth and explore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Your items?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The artifacts, the Ring of Boros, the old hag. That is the next step in my quest. She told us it would be in the Feywood. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feywild. Close. Researcher.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That is where we need to go. But that's why we ran into her in Vasselheim, and she wouldn't tell me anything more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you plan to use your items? For better good in the world?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, you've seen how I've used my Mending Wheel. Countless ways.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, thank you. You healed my cask. I'll always be grateful.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Moreover, it would prove to the council that all of the things that I went on this journey for to begin with, it was true. Or for naught. And really, to gain the respect of my father and everyone else. You don't know how hard it is to be a chromatic dragon in a metallic world! It's not easy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there's no question that you are an invaluable member of Vox Machina, and our friend, and our family. And that is not in question.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Of course. Which is why I have pledged my loyalty to you all. And I need your strength, as well. There is no way I could accomplish in my mission alone. I mean, Grog, when I ran into you in that one bar. How many men were you beating up? I counted eight, if I recall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that sounds right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't count.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's that many.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Here was this brute who I would have ran away from, but here you were, and I found you to be rather charming. I figured, well, that's some good company to keep, rather. And then I met the rest of you, and look where we are now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please maybe don't do that again.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She felt nothing, but of course. And I was giving my new Krull blade a good old try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you were. Maybe not on sleeping people anymore. People who are actually attacking us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She was-- okay, fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And perhaps be a little tentative. Do a little practice run in the woods on your own, once in a while, and see what the effects are before you go whipping it out.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are there woods nearby?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is an intervention. We love you very much, but you killed an old lady.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the way you kill people.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all on the up and up now, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: One raises a hand to me or Vox Machina, they are going to die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah, they are!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It is simple. I do not know why this is a discussion. I won't be as cruel--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, she didn't even really do anything. She was really old.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was attacking us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clearly, we all love you as family, and nobody blames you, but you once killed a child, and none of us blame you for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it too early to start drinking? I pull out the cask of ale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that happened in the heat of battle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I'm really sensitive about that, Vax. I'm

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm well aware.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that was different.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was an accident!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was pretty fucking deliberate, what he did.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, to someone who was opposing us. That was a child who was innocent. Or was he opposing us, too? I don't remember, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it all falls apart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was being puppeted by sorcerer Michael Jackson.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one agrees with you today more than I, and I think we can adjust our perspective slightly. Right, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the word?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill softer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll show you how. You just have to do it really slow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uriel's waiting for us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's table this. We'll stick a pin in this discussion. We'll all be thinking long and hard about this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, it wasn't intentional and everybody knows that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely. Not intentional. No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn into Minxie and start walking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Minxie! I go and give a little scratch behind the ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys gather and make your way into the city of Emon proper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, before we head towards Uriel, we probably should-- do we have any sort of proof that the Briarwoods actually did horrible things and it wasn't us attacking them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I've got these little scars right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The scars are still there. They're still wounds that are healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Cool. Just making sure that we had something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then there was what's-his-name, Awesome Pants, who was there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seeker Asum.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Allura saw everything, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did she see the fight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura didn't see the fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We know she knows what's up, but whether she can be used as a reliable witness is-- we've got multiple witnesses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There were those guards, too. There was guards outside the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They were incinerated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, they were the Briarwoods' guards, anyway.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: One of them was still alive. I didn't kill both of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He went away with the Briarwoods, I'm going to assume.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What a dick! We go to see Uriel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I made a choice for the team! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to the palace of Tal'Dorei, through the front doors. The guards that are there lead you in and one of them says, "Uriel is waiting within the throne chamber." You guys are led down the main hallway into the very center of the palace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I come out of Minxie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The nervous guard, thankfully, puts his weapon away and is like, "Oh! Lady Keyleth, my "apologies." And puts his spear to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's still here, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I buzz over to that specific guard and say, do you have a lost and found here? I have this really badass serpent-style belt. Sometimes it crawls around on its own. Sometimes it's just a belt. And I lost it here the other night. And I'm really hoping-- I mean, it ties everything together. Is there anyone I can check with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once all the guards are settled and a really awkward silence hits the room, Uriel stands up from the throne and looks upon you. Pacing slightly, back and forth. "Thank you all for "joining me. I must say, I am troubled by recent events, and I wish to speak to you regarding them "before taking any action. I owe you that much for all you've done for me. Before you left for "Vasselheim, you showed immediate interest in the Briarwoods. Percy in-- Where is Percival?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, he's not feeling well today after the events of last night, so he stayed behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Listen. Attacked our guests shortly after the meal "in their own guest quarters. Forcing them to flee, after you destroyed the hallway, ruined their "carriage, murdered two of their guards, two more outside, and leaving Seeker Asum to witness this "entire process." Asum gives a nod. "You then tortured their carriage driver, requested he be "sent to the dungeon beneath your keep. And upon my sentries returning from Greyskull to deliver him, "they find a freshly murdered old woman not far behind the path you took. Not long after, Seeker "Asum found me and corroborated most of this unexpected, violent behavior. I then asked Arbiter "Brom here to divine the nature of this murder. And through his divine sight, through the goddess "Ioun, comes to tell me it was none other than you, Tiberius, that slaughtered this elderly woman "while she slept."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, I am quite disturbed by the events of these past 14 hours, and I would like to hear an "explanation. Arbiter, if you could please, prepare the space." Arbiter Brom steps forward and pulls forth from underneath his robes a necklace that contains a holy symbol. The same symbol you saw across the temple beneath the Slayer's Take, an eye-like inscription of the god Ioun. Brom grasps it, looks about you all, and prepares this slight hand gesture, and you feel a slight tingle across the skin that lasts a few seconds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I recognize the spell he's casting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say go ahead and make a-- this would be a religion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's doing a cleric thing, yeah? Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, the incantation completes. No seeming noticeable effect. Brom nods and steps back in the line of the thrones. I want all of you guys to roll charisma saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch. Always a problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get advantage, and I rolled a 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. Bards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Good to know. Uriel then looks to the rest of you. "So. I've said my piece for the "moment. Explain."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I step forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a quick insight check on Asum to see if I can still recognize if he's still affected by the mind-control thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an insight check, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh yeah! 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing at Asum, the way he's looking at you and the general tension and feeling of the room, you gather that Asum is not his normal self completely. You step forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if that counts for nothing here, then nothing makes sense. But if that is not enough, let us start here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The Briarwoods are vampires. And that old lady, who was a butthole by the way, was with this demonoid person who we had to fight as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One thing at a time. That's true, but one thing at a time. We had prior knowledge of the Briarwoods' intentions before this evening. And I myself went to spy on them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. Percy doesn't like them because they killed his family. They took over his home, after killing his family. He got away. He knows they're scary. We're trying to protect you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So the point is, we all know how dangerous it is that the knowledge of vampire existence and the spreading of those vile creatures. And now we know they do exist. So however the means that that came about is neither here nor there. We know where they are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And if you're wondering how we know they're vampires-- (whispering) Vax, this is your cue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will subject myself to any test, to any wizard or mage in this city who you know can ascertain the truth. To look through my eyes, to see my memories. I don't know shit about magic, but there are people who do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perhaps too abruptly and without telling you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We tried to get your attention. I called for you immediately. As soon as we knew there was danger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And don't take our word for it. Anyone, have them look in here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, you take a Stormwind's word for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Silence! Silence. You're in my court now, Stormwind. You put so much weight upon this trust, "and you have done a good service. But also I've heard whispers that you've thrown this trust "around in many circles. Remember, we held a parade in your honor; we spread the word of the good "deeds you've done. We, at our own costs of Emon, built you a keep, a home, at great expense, to "show thanks. And also, I believed, upon allowing you to join the council, put us square. I owe you "nothing. Just as you owe me nothing."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you not want the truth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I want the truth, but I also want you to understand the stakes that are here and why there "is this question. As the leader of this-- not this city, but this entire countryside, I have to be "sure, and this is not the first time I have been lied to by very close, trusted people, so I have "to be thorough."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is why I offer myself completely into your control and put myself under your supervision and any user of the arcane arts you want to peer inside my mind, let them step up to the plate, because I have nothing to hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, while you are inquiring about him, you might inquire about Seeker Asum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're worried about lies within your own ranks, I think you should start with him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In fact, I actually might be able to help Seeker Asum, if you will allow me to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Help him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over at Asum, and Asum gives a look to Uriel and Uriel--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was mind-controlled last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have had Asum at my side for the better part of 15 years. He is responsible, far more than "your merry band has ever attempted, for keeping and maintaining the good and lawful state of this "country."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uriel, your own family was not themselves! And you know that! Look into my mind! Now! Today! You don't need to guess anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are speaking, half-elf. Now, I would assign "Allura to such an endeavor. However, it has also been noticed that she has grown quite friendly and "attached to your group, and in this circumstance, there is question. So you will be, in a few days, "assigned an individual to this ritual of which you are presenting yourself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uriel, please--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh. The Briarwoods, regardless of what you may think they may be, or we do-- that will "show in time-- have shown nothing over the past five years but graciousness, and gone through all "proper channels to establish this relationship between our city and theirs. Far more than the "previous family ever attempted."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, one may smile and smile and still be a villain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That goes both ways. Now, please."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What can it hurt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up until last night, he was himself. Trust us that now he is not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He came to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There has been nothing about his behavior, at all, to insinuate any change of anything of the "sort. And I have known the man for quite some time, before I even took this throne. However, I "will, in the good graces and the relationship we forged, allow this. Asum, are you all right with "this?" Asum gives a nod. "Well, if this is to be how it is. Certainly." And he steps forward. The halfling approaches you, looking you in the face. All right. You would like to attempt your Greater Restoration spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First, I meditate for a second, and I cast Enhance Ability on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, as you begin casting, you notice the guards all go for their weapons and ready themselves, uncertain of what's about to transpire. There is a tension in the room based on what this is going to be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get some meditation music, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! (chanting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So first you cast Enhance Ability on yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I maybe inspired by that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Asum puts his hand up like, hold off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Tuvan throat singing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So first you cast Enhance Ability on your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Self.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What ability?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To enhance wisdom? Wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You reach out with Greater Restoration. You complete the ritual. You touch onto the arms of Asum. It fades, and you see in his eyes there's a moment of clarity and an inhale. A slight gasp, like some realization hits him and his expression changes and looks towards you and just goes-- He puts his hands out like this for a moment, just trying to almost tell you something. Go ahead and make a wisdom check. Just a d20. Or no, make an insight. Make a straight insight. This is more of an insight roll here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Oh! 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense through the subtlety of physical motion and expression, Asum is telling you, just go with me on this. He steps back into the place next to the throne. There's a brief moment of pause. Uriel says, "And, Asum?" Asum goes, "My stance has not changed. I know not what she is attempting or thought the situation "was, but it appears to me that this was either misinformation or at least at the time being, "hopefully, not a lie. But I believe Brom has taken care of that, yes?" And Brom gives a nod. "I certainly have hoped to." Uriel goes, "Hm. All right. Here's the circumstance: as it stands, I fear I must revoke "Vox Machina's membership in the council of Tal'Dorei until further notice, for the safety of "our countryside and the current tension in our relationship."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Objection! That's it. I just wanted to say that. Please continue. I just want it noted that we object strongly to this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand. And this will only continue until all of our investigations are complete."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we still allowed free rein to roam about as we please? Are we under arrest for anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are not under arrest. You are revoked from the council, and you will be closely watched "until our investigations are complete."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long will your investigations take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks back to Asum and Asum says, "Well, depends on how quickly we can acquire the "information; it could be weeks. I'll do my best to make it thorough and quick."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we allowed to leave the city in that time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel looks back and says, "You may leave if you wish. Know that there have been precautions "taken. Should you attempt to flee, we will find you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And when are you to look into my mind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Weirdo! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It freaking ends here. Right away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you read my mind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is no spoon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We ought to speak to the Lyceum to find a proper individual of sufficient power and trust to "do this, as Allura right now is being kept out of the scenario."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we allowed to speak with Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you wish. Outside of these chambers. Do what you must to clear your name. I would like "very much for this all to be true, what you're saying. But do not flee. Do not give an "inclination that you attempt to escape this judgment, for we will take that as a sign of "guilt."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've no intention of going anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should we conclude that your actions were beyond reason and the moral fiber of this council "before your return, we will have no choice to put a bounty on your heads, should you not return. I "really, really do not wish to do this. Do not make me do this."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are we done here?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I want to believe you all. I ask you, show that my trust has not been misplaced all this "time. Now, you may leave."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look forward to the second parade you'll throw for us after our names are cleared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I turn to the guards that were grabbing at their weapons and I flex real fast at them and then I walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four of them go, (yelps).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bitch! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys go back out the doors that you entered, the guards now a little closely following as you exit, leading you out of the palace, down the front steps, and essentially stand at the front of the palace gates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. I was just talking to one of your friends. Have you seen a belt that is shaped like a snake? Sometimes it moves around on its own. And it answers to the name Simon, but usually it's just a belt and looks really cool. Have you seen it? Is there a lost and found I can check out? It's very dear to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard just looks for a second and goes, "I think you've got more important matters to deal "with before you go looking for a belt, sir."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's that other guy? He was more receptive to this. Do I see that other guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling. Seriously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards all turn around and start ascending the stairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's on all the fan art. It really makes sense to have it on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't appear to be listening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep an eye out for it. 100 gold to any chap who finds it and holds onto it for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of them stop in their step for a second and then keep walking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a nice guy! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to get six belts thrown at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's terrible. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a brief pause. But also. A brief pause.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a two in persuasion? Oh wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll break in tonight and find it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could we wait outside for Allura?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll risk it all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you are now currently there in the cobblestone street of the Cloudtop District, removed from the Council of Tal'Dorei and left in this interesting circumstance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, what happened? Your magic didn't work?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it worked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But Asum lied.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He gave her a magic winky face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, essentially. Yeah. He gave me like a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean? Does that mean Uriel's under their control? I don't understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he playing some sort of long game here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It must mean that we have something to fear from Uriel. Or someone else close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know who to trust anymore, to be totally honest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It worked. I could feel it break. It worked, and he's got some sort of long game. I don't know if it's because he doesn't want Uriel to know, for whatever reason. I don't know if it's because he has some deeper, ulterior motive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think he was faking that he was healed, and maybe he wasn't?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or maybe we have to bring proof of their vampirism back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. No to Vex. What was your question?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To bring back proof of them being vampires.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Proof would help. Hey! Don't we have a prisoner? Can't we question the prisoner?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he bleeding out? What if he's dead? We're so screwed!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I made sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the guy that Percy shot the hand off of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cauterized his wounds, remember?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should question him. He could have proof.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit! I hope everything's okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait a minute! I really need to go to Allura. She's our best interest right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We get it! You want her body. Now's not the time.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It is beyond that. There are several reasons to go. We need to get the Earring of Telescription. I need her to enchant something for me, too. As well as the fact I fear that our keep may be in danger. I would like to ask her if she may be able to set up a warding spell for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you go get her and bring her to the keep? I need to find out if this boy is all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we can split up. I can go with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this discussion, the palace doors open and you hear the quick footsteps of Allura, rushing from the palace now, running towards you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Saving the day. Again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, she's coming out of the palace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's coming out of the palace, behind you guys. Like after the council had just closed. The meeting had finished. She basically gave chase to you guys and is now catching up to you on the street.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the shit happened in there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were just talking about you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everyone-- I don't fully know what happened last night, and--" She looks to you, Tiberius, and says, "You didn't, did you? Please tell me you did not kill that woman."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I absolutely did!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she was attacking us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It looks bad, but she was a threat.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Her and another one with this-- what was he, a tiefling? Named the Broker attacked us. And that's why I killed her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Brom's divination is very clear. And he divined that the woman was currently filled with "fear, attempting to flee, and unconscious when she was murdered."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did she flee when she was unconscious?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She fled, went unconscious, then we butchered her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just accept it for what it is, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just worry. I know not what happened here, and I heard what you said, and I honestly do "not trust the Briarwoods myself either. There was something about that meal and the conversation, "and their presence that put me off entirely. It was strange. And what you say makes a lot of "sense. Vampirism is a bit beyond what I was expecting. I did sense some powerful masqueraded "arcane essence from Lady Briarwood. Look, I would recommend for this to do your best to be thorough "in this. Bring back any and all information you can. From the words I hear, you probably have at "best a few weeks before this comes to a close. And if you don't have enough evidence to support your "argument-- well, I don't know."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cannot anyone look into my mind and see?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but that might not be proof enough for them. Someone could have corrupted your mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have to understand. Not all arcane works that way. There are magics that can dabble "in that realm, but none that specialize that here in Emon. Divination, yes there are elements of "that. We can see the physical. We can see certain events. But to look into one's mind is a different "magic entirely."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there no spells that can divine if someone's speaking true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was attempted during that council, but after you left, Brom notified Uriel and the "Council that many of you were resistant to the spell, and as such, it could not be verified."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) We should have rolled low! Just tell us you're doing it, we won't resist it! What the shit? Doesn't even trust us to tell the truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we came back with proof?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What sort of proof do you think they would accept? The head of Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, because it'll disappear the minute we kill her or something. They're vampires, I don't know what they do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives a thought to that. She goes, "Interestingly enough, if an artifact or an item "brought forth from them could be divined, that should tell all."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there still the remaining wreckage of their carriage? Is that still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that is no-- a sigil, if you will." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What sort of artifact? Like, a brooch? A handbag?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we talking about that motherfucker's teeth?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I need to see that sigil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah!" And she reaches into her pocket and brings out your Earring of Transcription.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you so much, Lady Allura!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she hands it to you, she gives you a really, really concerned look. And just gives it to you and hands it back. And it's a look of-- and it hits you: it's a look of disappointment with a hint of heartbreak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's the worst! I'm not angry, I'm just disappointed. Ugh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like I've failed you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks back to you as you take it and goes, "Do your best to clear your name."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I shall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As celebrated heroes of this city, there is a lot more on the line here besides just your "well-being. There's a lot of people in this town that look up to you. Nevertheless, I've already "said more than I should. Good luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks behind and you can see she takes this small hood of the same material of her robe that she's wearing and puts it up over her head and rushes off towards her white tower towards the edge of the Cloudtop District.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking politics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one insight checked her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's telling the truth. Let's go make sure the prisoner isn't dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. So wait. What are our avenues? We're going to have to Columbo this. What are our avenues of finding proof?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We say as we're walking back to the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a prisoner we can question. Who knows if that will yield anything. And then, we might have to go gather evidence, which means leaving town against his word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we're allowed to leave town.

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just can't look like we're fleeing, so we tell them where we're going. They can even fucking follow us. I don't care.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we tell them that we're going to their political-- the people that they're trying to create a political relationship with? We're just going off to invade your political allies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh come on! You half-elves. I swear to god! Have you never heard of lying before? Yeah! We don't tell them where we're going. We're going on a field trip. We're going to pick berries. Fuck all, but we go there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The only way we can go there is telling them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? And we're going there, what for?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: When I talk to Asum and get that sigil to that damn Briarwood keep. That's how we get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't we say we're taking a picnic-- oh, we took a wrong turn. Hey, it's the Briarwoods!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We don't have to lie to them. We tell them where we're going, and we can just go there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't have to if we don't want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're pretty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Especially that beardy side, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a full beard right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you do know is the sigil that a teleportation circle is attached to is known when you cast or create the circle. The circle does not necessarily indicate or maintain the sigil it's attached to.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's just a piece of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning, there are two parts to it. There is the sigil that it sends to, and there is the actual ritual circle that is created. The circle that attaches to it is not the same as the destination. There are elements of it that connect it, but you would not be able to ascertain a sigil to Whitestone immediately from looking at the initial circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks for the cups, guys! The cup.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just noticed that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let's go check on this poor little shit in the dungeon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then the next step will be to seek out Seeker Asum?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'd like to stop by the temple real quick to pick up my decanter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many errands do you have to run?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Endless errands.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Go run your errands! We've got a mystery to solve.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want to be there when we talk to the prisoner, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys make your way back to Greyskull Keep. Are you going with them or you're--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm doing all the shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got a list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like to know the list.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to stop at an armory because I want my crossbow reinforced. I don't know what that means. I want to learn a different sigil. The one that I researched for the waste fair, or for the way-- the Feywild! There's this big city next to it that I researched, that is near it, and in that city might be a sigil. So I'm going to go see if I can learn it. And then I want to come back and start enchanting my blades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a busy day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can give it to you. I wrote it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Coming soon on Friday nights: The Adventures of Tiberius's Errands! 7:00 to 10:00 every Friday night on Twitch.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And then I have to go to the dry cleaners for my robe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you begin that process, the rest of you continue back to the Keep. As you approach Greyskull Keep, there are two individuals waiting for you at the gate that you do not recognize from a distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what? Say that again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two individuals waiting for you at the gate. You can see at a distance, but you don't recognize.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're our handlers, probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, come on. Let's go have a talk with someone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all going!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go arm in arm in one big line!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not like we're all headed in the same direction, anyway.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Who doesn't have a ring?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A ring of what?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: An earring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have one right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog doesn't have one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away from the keep are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're probably a good 100 to 150 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I whistle really loud and say, who are these fucks in front of the keep? to the guard that we have employed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. Let me try and see who's on duty right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has notes on who is on duty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cordell shouts down from the top of the wall and says, "I don't think they're a threat."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. We'll be the judge of that. As you were.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, keep in mind, these are our allies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you go out to them, they both smile.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Favored enemy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They begin walking up, and the man steps forward. You can see he's got small dirty glasses at the end of his nose and says, "Hello, hello! Good afternoon, everyone! I'm sorry to be a "bother. But unless my eyes and tales do deceive me, might you all be the heroes known as Vox "Machina?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check to see if these guys are legit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Legit what? Old people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could be Lord and Lady Briarwood, for all I know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Me too. I did well. I rolled 18 on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. From what you can tell, they are both happy, simple folk that are here with a tension of purpose, but nothing that seems to set off any alarms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are Vox Machina. I'm sure word of us has spread far and wide. We're a pretty big deal. Why have you made this journey to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman, who's holding his side, lets go of his arm and says, "We come to you humbly as "representatives of the farming community just north of Emon's walls."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I love farmers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am Riley Klaus and this is my husband, Ben." "Pleasure to meet y'all."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Simms, just gone like that!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mr. Simms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was the bull." Riley says, "Kyle said he saw it fly northwest."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Northwest? Can I do a nature check to see if I can recognize the creature he's describing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we certain he's not describing a dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is, from what they're describing, a lot bigger than any birds you've encountered in your experience. You've heard whispers of larger birds in the wild, but you've never seen anything like that. You haven't had any personal experience hearing or seeing anything of this size.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it is a bird?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what they described it as. At night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When did these birds start showing up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all we can spare."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep your money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, keep your money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can't possibly--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about this? What if you supplied us with a small stream of produce for our servants here at the keep? For cooking, for feeding them, for feeding us when we're here? It'll be a sight less than 500; it wouldn't be nothing. You could still give us something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes! We could, we'd be more than happy to!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: However, despite what my companion is saying, we are not agreeing to go after this winged beast quite yet. We hear your plight, and we sympathize, and we will do what we can, but we have very pressing matters right now. Is there a deadline of some sort? When is your next harvesting season?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, there's no deadline, but the longer that goes by, the more and more we lose by the "night. Two weeks in and we've lost half of our livestock. If the creature is this big, I imagine "it eats quite a bit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And how long of a ride is it? Is it walking distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To... where?"

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM, SAM
lines.text: To your farm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "North side of Emon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so real close!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are friends of the elderly, obviously, and also of the farming community, so we are very interested in helping you. May we talk about it a bit before we decide how and when we would tackle this problem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other and nod and he taps her hand and says, "Yes. By all means-- If you "could, please help us stop this beast from ruining our livelihood."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And can you please tell us how to get to your place. Do you normally stay there? Are you normally home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We wander about the community, but we do have a homestead. If you look, it's the large red "wood and partially brick-based homestead closest to the city walls, on the north farm. Right "outside of Emon. It's hard to miss, if you're headed that direction."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quickly. Presently, we will find you. Guys, we were told to sit and spin basically. I mean, what's wrong with earning some brownie points in the eyes of Uriel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mr. and Mrs. Kraut, as friends of the elderly--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Klaus."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, Kraut. Do they normally come at night, or have they ever abducted any of your sweet bulls during the day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've not seen it during the day. It'd be easier for us to identify if we had. Seems to only "hunt at night."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And have they ever messed with a human?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not that we've heard of. Not yet." He gives you this sudden look of realization and fear. And pats and comforts his wife who suddenly realizes, oh my. Are they going to take us now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll probably be by like tonight or tomorrow morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Tomorrow morning at the latest. We have a little bit of business. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're in the middle of doing something. We'll get to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take him by the hand and say, we will see you presently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here. My business card.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you can take that to the bank.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't actually; it's worth nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, thank you for listening to us ramble on, and we look forward to hearing from you in the "next day."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." He pats her on the arm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Travel safe, Mr. Kraut!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hide your bull; hide your wife.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both wander off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are in danger of being ostracized. We should really be nice to everybody right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were just having a conversation about how we should try to be nice from now on. But we do have very pressing matters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's get fucking in there and talk to that little--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's funny how that type of thing can come back to bite you in the ass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I call up to Cordell. Oi, Cordell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember when I told you not to let anyone linger outside the keep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be fair, the Klauses are well-known in the community."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Krauts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Klauses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They came here for business. I figured it was probably something you'd want to hear. I "apologize."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By all means, use your judgment over the orders of your master. That's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cordell bows his head sheepishly. "I apologize. I'm sorry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ignore him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are here to help people! We're here to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does his finger like this and the gates open in towards the inside of the keep wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what is wrong with you all today?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had a really bad dinner last night. That's all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I head straight to the jail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are doing that, Tiberius, what's the first thing you're trying to do?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Stop by and pick up the decanter from the temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He said it required two days. It's been less than a day since you dropped it off, just so you're aware.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Then the only thing I do is visit the keep with the sigils library or whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the Lyceum? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going. I'm just going to go hang out up on the wall outside the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you head to the Lyceum, the clerk lets you in. What are you specifically looking to find or research?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The sigil that's closest to the Feywild.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In researching what they have at their disposal, you understand that the Feywild itself, because it is a separate plane, the magics to traverse it are a little more difficult to do. If you notice-- and I'll confirm here just to be sure that we're on the same page-- before I go full on this here. Pardon me, just a moment while I scan through the book. The mighty book. The book of might. Yes. Sigils of teleportation require the same plane of existence, meaning you can teleport anywhere within the Prime Material Plane that you exist in. To traverse into the Feywild, you have to actually find a door into the Feywild, and then you would be able to use a sigil from the Feywild.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Then I only pick up my decanter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is not ready yet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't do that! Damn, I forgot! My short-term memory is just jacked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. It's all good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, somebody's been to the Feywild.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's tied to the moon cycle. And at certain places where nature is set to run wild. A lot of druidic tribes tend to mark these locations, and in some cases actually guard them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know where a hole in one is. Grog went through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if you recall-- good memory-- in the Frostweald, the partially frozen forest where you had that conversation with the nymph-- that portal that she existed through was specifically a door into the Feywild, which you recognized.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What city was that near?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was south of Westruun.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Then I'll go to the thing and I'll find the Westruun sigil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Through your research, you do find a sigil to Westruun. This is allowing you to go into this portion for this sigil because you've already used the favor that you had to get the sigil of Kraghammer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I didn't. I used the amulet and we got permission to come there. I saved that favor for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. We've had our break; we've returned to the table. A quick note, we are 50 subscribers away from our next giveaway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 50? Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If we can get there, that'd be awesome! We'll have our giveaway-- the signed cast Critical Role photo and the cast signed art poster by Kit Buss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kit Buss, ladies and gentlemen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have found yourselves down to the basement area. You hear the distant pinging of metal, an occasional squeaking metallic noise. Like something is being altered, turned, or quenched in a water trough. Like the process of blacksmithing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go to the edge of the door and knock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you knock on the metal door, it's like a (boom). The pinging stops. Just hangs for a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy? It's Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not right now. Please. I'm sorry. I just need to clear my head."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. We'll be here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment later, you see Percy's eyes appear at the edge of the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just looking at them, you can see they look a little sunken, a little weary.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you sleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not as much as I'd like."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes look away for a second, looks back at you. "I'm all right. Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We went and saw Uriel. Everyone in the city hates us. They think we're all criminals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great. I have to get back to my work."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The slit shuts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we'll see you later, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, however, walk down to the other side of the cell. The cell door's been closed. The keys are hanging on the nail by it. You have not used the cell until this point. It's technically pristine and unused since the construction of the keep, but the keys still hang on the key ring. On the inside of it, there is no thatch. Nothing has been put in to really make a comfortable floor. And hanging from manacles--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's hanging?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're the worst.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was put in as a prisoner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and get the keys, and I take him down from the manacles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she rushes into the cell, begins unlocking the manacles. He's unconscious at this time. Dirt streaked on his face and spatters of dried blood from the blast of the gun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go ahead and I administer Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes to consciousness on the ground, dirtied, sore. Essentially broken before you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he look like he's been bitten at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to inspect?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look at his neck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's going on?" Looking at the sides of his neck, there does not appear to be any sign of any puncture wounds, anything that would be reminiscent of what your brother currently is healing from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check to see if he is also under a mind-control spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, no. He is barely coming to consciousness. There isn't enough of a presence at the moment to really read past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, there. Welcome back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where am I?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are being held, at the moment, for your own safety.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For my own safety?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How?" He looks at his hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you were captured. We're pretty sure the Briarwoods are going to be pissed as hell that you let the carriage get hit. We're just trying to protect you, really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, his friends all died, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we not feel like terrible people enough already?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's not have this conversation in front of the prisoner. What's your name, boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My name is Desmond. Desmond Otham. I am the son of a messenger, a courier of the de Rolo "family."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's the son of a messenger! That's even more ironic!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, do you need to step outside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm good. Continue. Son of a messenger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right now, everyone is at risk. The Briarwoods are bad people, you can attest to this, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Can you tell us everything you know about them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not going to matter. They're going to find me. No one's supposed to get away."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's always a first time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't even know where to begin." He adjusts himself, sliding back, putting his back against the wall of the cell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach into the Bag of Holding. I pull out the little goblet, and I pour some ale into a cup, and I hand him a little bit of ale. No, it's fine. I take a little sip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please don't take offense if I don't trust a drink from strangers who've, well, to be honest, "put me in this position."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I put it beside him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you want to know?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We want to know if the Briarwoods--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are vampires.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty much. They're vampires, right? I mean, they're vampires.

lines.name: MATT
