lines.text: From what I know of vampires, they're not supposed "to go out during the day, right? But I'm sure I've seen Lady Briarwood walk in the sun many a time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As I recall, yes. Lord Briarwood doesn't make too many public appearances."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have there been any strange goings-on in their residence? Sounds you've heard? People disappearing? Boxes coming in or out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Cure Wounds on him. I know Cure Wounds, bitches! Level up!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Have I reached the keep yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not yet. You're probably about an hour away, at this point. From the time you've taken to research, find this, learn the sigil to Westruun, and begin your trek back. Fortunately, you got what you wanted, but you're out of the picture for a little bit. He flinches as you put your hand up, and as you touch him, he exhales. You get to him just as he can react, briefly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11. Do I add anything to that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe you add your Wisdom modifier to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You live in that world long enough, you believe there is no way out. Death would be easy, though "I've seen that death is no real end there. It's just the beginning of a whole new terrible "existence. A far worse fate."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we keep you here, protected, would you be willing to tell your story to someone else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who would you want me to tell it to?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The emperor. The guards here. An army that could go and fight the Briarwoods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This could be an option to save Whitestone, and you would have your freedom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. You don't know what it's like. You don't know what they've done. They're "going to find me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can protect you. We are safe here in this keep, and you're surrounded by very powerful allies now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've stood before them, and we did not fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll think about it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you like to stay in the guest room upstairs? You'd be more comfortable. You could get a good night's rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put it out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That resonates with him immediately, and his eyes flash open. "I mean no disrespect, but if "this is safe, then I'd rather stay here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it is. And we will bring a bed down to you, make sure you're comfortable. I don't want you sleeping on the floor. That's terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're all being very accommodating."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll get every consideration for protection. We value your info very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're also the key to our own freedom, so it's important.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lucky for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just be glad you're not an old woman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll stay here for now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need to think on it. I've been promised such protection before."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the Briarwoods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From a few. And they're dead. An enemy of an enemy doesn't necessarily make them a friend, "I've discovered."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but it can make them allies if they have mutual enemies. Of their enemies. It's a little complicated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This whole conversation, the emotional recalling of everything, you can see has been very taxing on him and his still mostly conscious state. He looks exhausted, scared, and still trying to suss out all the information coming at him right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, why don't you carry the bed down from upstairs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem. Keep the goblet nearby. It is very nice ale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you like something to eat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, please."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll have our staff bring down some food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes the goblet. He looks at it, smells it, but still holds it at bay as you walk off. You eventually go-- easy enough for you-- take the bed. You have to turn it to the side to take it out, which causes all of the cushions to fall out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab a little pillow with my toes, and I hobble down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes about 20 minutes and three trips, but you manage to get the bed down there from the guest room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You place it there. As you guys walk back, you notice as you see Grog walking back down the stairway-- right around the corner as you go down the steps, the hallway goes to the cell, and it turns to the right and to the left to the workshop. You see around the corner a shoulder, listening in. There's a person. And you recognize that it is Percy. Percy has stepped out of the workshop and apparently has been hearing everything this entire time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm fine." And Percy immediately steps away and you hear the door close with a slam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give him time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So moody!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah, I'm going to lock it. I'm just going to lock your door. To make sure you're safe, make sure nobody can get in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep him away from me. Who is that?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's in the same boat as you, trying to stay safe from danger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Briarwoods destroyed his family, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see now, there's like this look of tension on his face that's mixed with tired. And eventually finding the bed and takes the goblet-- still filled, has not drunk from it-- just slips it next to the side of the bed. Eventually food is brought down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a chamber pot, because come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the basic pleasantries are brought within the cell. He lies on the bed and takes the plate up with him and starts just scarfing some of the bread rolls down. And immediately starts going for the mashed potatoes. You can see a decent meal hasn't been had in quite a while. Especially the journey, what is essentially a seven to eight day journey from Whitestone, probably has not been very kind to him. Eats and then promptly passes out on the bed. Food still mashed on the side of the face. Just goes straight into a slumber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any other entrance to the cell area besides the door? No barred windows or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's underground. It's all solid, solid stone walls. And there is the barred front door, and then just goes right into the hallway that goes up the stairs to your left and across the way and around the corner to the workshop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't cast any kind of alarm system? A trigger?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that Percy can't get anything through there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me reference my spell tome. It's not a common one. It's situational. But let me check real quick. I haven't read that chapter from my book in a while.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is Allura on the way back from the Lyceum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura's tower is in the Cloudtop, which is the central part of Emon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do want to go check out that bird creature at the farmhouse tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Well, have we stationed a guard down there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should. We have five or six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll go talk to Cordell. That's his name, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, not Cordell. Let's get somebody else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guy that's the captain of the guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that Kendrick? Or Shayne? Oh, the girl?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the guy. He's awesome and he's an archer, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jarett?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jarett. That's it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll get Jarett. Oh, Jarett?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to the back part of the wall, and there is a small tower that's constructed as part of the back wall. That's where Jarett usually keeps watch. Jarett has the in-between shift between the guards, so he can be present for both sides and keep a watch during the afternoon until the nighttime. Probably till about midnight or so. So as you make your way out of the keep, Tiberius, are you heading back to the keep or are you heading toward the Cloudtop District? This will dictate whether or not you show up around this time.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to Allura's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm staying down in the prison, just for the time being. I don't want to leave him alone with Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to find Jarett, who's up at the top of the tower. And as you call to him, Jarett leans over. And you see him, you know, short jet-black hair, darker complexion. Very handsome, younger, early-twenties guy. Well-dressed over his studded leather armor that he wears underneath and has the crossbow on the side. He leans over. "Scanlan, it has been some time. It is so good to hear from "you. What can I be of service for?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need you to watch a prisoner for us, downstairs in our jail cell, which we had built and are now using. You'll be guarding the prisoner to make sure he doesn't escape, but also making sure he stays safe. He possesses information that's very valuable to us. And one of the people who hires you might try to kill him, so if Percy tries to go in there, can you stop him without hurting either party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I imagine this would be very well-suited for my skill set. It will be strange to keep watch "against one of my employers, but he's been a bit sheepish around me anyway."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think you could take Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I think I can at least talk some sense into him!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow! Jarett, you're ballsy! Just out of curiosity, if he was running at you, what would you do? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, first and foremost, I would dive in the forward motion, leg out, to put him off "balance. This would be from a frontal melee-- you're messing with me, aren't you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little bit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, gnomes! Very well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need anything to help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have access to my own private armory, and I have utmost faith."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well, keep him safe and there's an extra five gold in it for you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Pathetic!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know! Ten! Ten gold!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gnomes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how money works. We'll talk to Vex about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. All right. I will do this." And he stands up, and goes and starts gathering his general setup supplies inside the guard tower. As you walk back to the keep, you hear him whistle and start calling out to Shayne to go ahead and take over, up in the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wasn't there for any of that. I was upstairs on the roof, just thinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, you make your way into the Cloudtop District. As you come to the front gates of the district, the guards that normally recognize you and welcome you in, recognize you and stand firm, weapons at the ready.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: At Allura's tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the Cloudtop District entirely. You guys had to get written permission to enter there when you first came to Emon, anyway, since that's where the nobility and many of the important figures of Emon reside. It appears that since you've been taken out of the Council and you're under investigation, your access to such a sensitive location within Emon has been temporarily revoked, and the guards are not letting you through.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is that it? So I just turn around? Go back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you. The guards are just there, standing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Greeting and salutations. I'm Tiberius Stormwind from Draconia. Moreover, a member of Vox Machina, over at Greyskull Keep. It seems that you all are posturing and whatnot. (chuckles) It's adorable. But I'm here to see Lady Allura. Could you let her know that I would like to speak to her, or get out of my way so I can just go over there and tell her myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have direct orders to not let you or any other member of Vox Machina into the Cloudtop "District until your investigation is complete. So no, and no."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, do the second thing. If you don't do one thing, do one of the other things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your information and wish has been processed, taken into consideration. Thank you "very much. Please be on your way."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Fly on myself and I go back to the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (whoosh) They both did not expect that exit. You essentially Superman-ed. You're just like (thud). Little cloud of smoke in the shape of a dragonborn left behind. All right. So as you cruise over, you see in the distance, from where you're standing at the top of the keep, you see a distant bead of dark shadow that approaches and grows larger, and it is an air-cruising Tiberius making his way towards the keep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hide behind-- I don't want to get hit, so I'm going to crouch down a little bit, carefully behind one of the pieces of wall. Yeah. Rough landings, sometimes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I fly in. Vox Machina!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Easy. Be careful.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry. Hi. What are you doing? Are you up here thinking?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why, I suppose I was. The others are downstairs interrogating that boy. Where have you been?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Off doing things that wasn't really that productive, overall, but they don't like me anywhere, especially now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to have a drink?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, actually, I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want a shot, though?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, I would love some alcohol. This calls for alcohol.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out my flask, and I'm amazed, because I've never seen this and I hand it over to him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh yes. (whoosh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you eat the flask?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, fire breath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to pass that bad boy back? Is it hot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's empty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's empty! Well, I guess that was worth it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (slurred) What? What are you talking about? Don't you tell me how to drink. Oh, you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I come out from the castle into the courtyard, and I go, hey! I feel like chicken tonight! Can we go hunt this big bird?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius-- I just got him drunk!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (slurred) He gave me a shot of his flask water, and it's so good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure you didn't hit him with the blunt side of your knife again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, he took a shot of the old firewater, and I don't know. We might want to slap him a bit--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (slurred) Allura doesn't like me anymore because I killed that bitch who tried to kill us, and now she's fucking-- nobody likes us!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's find Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Smart. Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? I was reading. What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tibs got turnt up. Will you fix it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vax gave me--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you do? Why are you touching me?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I love protecting you, it is-- and Lockheed is, he loves you, too--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't touch me right now!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: See, I'm telling you, nobody likes me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I gave him his first drinky. I'm sorry. Do you think you could pull him out of it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought he was going to say no! He didn't leave me any.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's good. Hi. How are you? I'm Tiberius-- Draconia. You are princess pretty face. He likes you, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gone!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog is riveted.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you touch me one more time!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! Sorry. Did you need to go somewhere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am doing something else, a request that was already made previously, before "can we fix "drunk Tiberius," so I'm a little busy! Why don't you go sleep it off, take a nap, and I will deal with you in a second.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is it sleepy time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Should I cast Fireball?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. And I shove him into the cell and put him in bed--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're not in the prison. We're out in the courtyard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I thought that you said-- everyone was like, Keyleth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm still in the prison. Everybody else is out of the prison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So where do you push him?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She pushed me off the roof.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! I thought we were downstairs.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I fall off the roof. I still have Fly on myself, don't I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't fall off the roof. I don't know what I do with him. I let him pass out.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to get a sandwich.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I let him go get a sandwich.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I encourage sandwich! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the quote of the night. Encouraged to get a sandwich, Tiberius wanders off. What are you doing to prepare what you were doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know! I got distracted!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm not there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as the day progresses, what would you guys like to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. My idea. Okay. We were wanting extra fortification? We were wanting extra protection. Okay? I can't necessarily cast a big spell. I could cast Hallucinatory Terrain. We have a few options; I'm giving them to you all. I can cast Hallucinatory Terrain to make this look like something else. I don't think-- I don't know. I don't know if that's a good idea. I don't know. I could conjure a few woodland beings for, like, extra bears. We could have some bears guarding the palace. I could also throw up a Wall of Thorns, to barrier the cell with the wall of thorns. You're not here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think everyone left. I think it's just you and me up here, and drunk Tiberius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I went downstairs, and I'm saying this to the group so I don't have to repeat myself!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, so then I turn around with my sandwich and am like, we have to just make Allura talk to us. She can fix everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please continue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wall of Thorns could be good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like Wall of Thorns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The thing with Wall of Thorns is it's not super big. It's 60 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty big!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. That's not the whole place, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, 60 feet long. I thought you meant high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, I don't know how high it is. Don't quote me on that. But it's not that long, but we could fortify the doors more. Have bears. We could do multiple things, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that the Hallucinatory Terrain wouldn't work. I felt like they could see right through me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the Briarwoods?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they can see through illusions pretty darn well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, Percy's here. He can defend for us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, you need a warding spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we just leave someone behind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy's behind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy's here and so are five? Six? How many employees do we have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our very capable guards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you make some extra bears that don't hate us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you make some extra bears that don't hate us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'll make some extra bears.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Put some little hats on them and make them cute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think you could fix him? Because he's a lot of firepower if we're going to go--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What gets rid of drunkenness? (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Restoration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Restoration would probably take care of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to burn a Restoration spell on your drunkenness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you cast little Restoration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could also just give it a couple of hours. Drink a lot of water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's probably close to 3:00 in the afternoon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it's 3:00 in the afternoon. The bird doesn't even come until night. We could let him wear it off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 3:00. We just established this. We're going to wait until night and go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She said she hated you. How did that feel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fine. That was fine. That was the heat of the moment. She was angry. We're a team.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the plan, guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to give him some coffee. And then we're going to set off for the north farmlands at dusk.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, we should get some corn and other harvestments at the farms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I make an army of bears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This concentration will last an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Conjure Woodland Beings?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! No! Hang on. What if I conjure a bear, and then-- let me make sure, while they figure their stuff out. See, we're all figuring stuff out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I leave Trinket in the prison with Jarett?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! That won't freak him out at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, with Cordell. Jarett's down in the cell. This is defense against invading vampires.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! I have a better idea!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't I conjure an elemental, and then I can cast Planar Binding on him and he'll hang out for 24 hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great! Do it. Make it done. Let's go kill a bird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lead with that next time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was figuring it out. It's new.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got to talk it through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Figuring it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! That'll do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't vampires hate fire? Can you do fire?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, fire! Fire elemental!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Running water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, water elemental! (gasps) Tiberius, remember that you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's drunk!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't talk to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He won't remember anything.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (slurred) I love how you shoot arrows at things' eyeballs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I use Minor Illusion to create Lockheed, and I have him scamper away.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Anyway, you're so pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So are you doing that, Marisha? Keyleth, are you summoning an elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Which kind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Water elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And you cast Planar Binding. Part of the material component cost is a gem that's worth at least 1,000 gold pieces.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have one of those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's a jewel that's red and palm-sized.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a diamond of awesome. And a regular diamond, as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I create a trap here, can you bind some magic to it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You can do anything with magic. You can make things go. You can make things stop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I cover Tiberius's mouth again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give her a diamond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Is this the awesome diamond or the regular diamond?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a regular diamond. The awesome diamond is special.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Don't do that!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! Why do you do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Diamonds are really expensive! Any diamonds!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! And an awesome diamond has got to be more than 1,000, so this time there's got to be at least 1,000. Grog, what kind of jewel do you have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a palm-sized ruby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A palm-sized ruby?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I got a big palm!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiberius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, just don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex. Your keen eye is able to ascertain that the palm-sized ruby is worth roughly 1,200 gold pieces and would be suitable for this ritual.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should use the ruby. Because I have an eye for these things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we think they're going to come while we do this? Do we want to waste it? Because that's an awesome outside defense. Do we want to waste it for this? What if they're coming? Does it cost one jewel per--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we should save that, because that's awesome!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a possibility, DM, that I could-- if he's sobered up-- if I set a trap, that a spell of his could be bound to it, somehow, and go off? I have no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to say. There are certain spells that can enable that. That can take certain spells that trigger at a certain time. Nothing that's particularly in your guys' realm of experience or understanding though, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So I can look into it for the future, but not today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because it might just, 24 hours and then we waste it. Nobody came.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. To be fair, the castle's being heavily watched by outsiders, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Listen. Let's just go.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Grog is big. Scanlan's small. Everything is great. Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we leave Trinket? To watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? He's going to go down in the prison with Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You bring Trinket down. Trinket stands watch right in the center, plops down right up against the bars.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knock on Percy's door and say, Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's out here. If you need anything, you just come out and you pet him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Welcome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (mumbling) Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aren't you sober yet?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, it's been like five minutes, hasn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have given you some water, and you've managed to sober up a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I actually picked his pocket and took his bottle of endless water. Don't you have a bottle of water like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That is currently left to be blessed for holy water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Oh, well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we take the scenic route to let him walk it off as we head up towards Big Bird's house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you decided? Have you given our community's "request some thought?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're here to help. We're the heroes that you asked for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We love old people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. That's really good of you. We will happily provide you with fresh produce, going "forward. We've talked to a few of the members of the community and we're going to make sure that's "taken care of."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where do you think we should stake out this bird? Where are your livestock kept?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to miss out there. We have pens for sheep; we "have pens for cows; we have pens for horses, other beasts of burden. That whole vicinity is where "most of these attacks seem to be coming. So that's probably your best bet there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the biggest you have are the bulls, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've lost a few of them, unfortunately."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll be all we need.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can one of us polymorph into a giant cow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could also talk to cows again. Maybe these cows will know something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We head out to the pasture.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First can I ask her, you said your neighbor boy, Kyle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kyle. The neighbor boy. The neighbor boy's son. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's true. Kyle's the one who originally spotted it, yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where does he live?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's actually the son of the man who runs most of the livestock areas over there. You can go "and head over there. He's probably still up, keeping his eye out in case it comes back."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. I go to Kyle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And sitting in a chair, holding a crossbow across his lap, you see a 19-year-old boy, rugged chin growth, dirty red hair that's disheveled. And he's sitting there looking around in the sky. Rocking back and forth in his chair as you approach. "Who "goes there?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, we're friends. We're friends of the Klauses. Mr. and Mrs. Klaus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Okay. So you the ones they say was coming to help?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We hear you have a keen eye, Kyle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've seen some things, yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where have they been attacking lately?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Points to the whole area in front of him and says, "Are you keeping watch now? Great. Thank "you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Wait! Don't leave yet. We need you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, yes. Keyleth. We are Vox Machina. Over from Greyskull Keep. I'm Tiberius Stormwind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's irrelevant. The point is, I was wondering if you had any more information about the creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, other than the fact that it was just a really big bird. Really big. Huge."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you remember any other details? Any other defining details other than "bird?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hard to see in the moonlight."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When it picks up a cow or whatever it's been picking up, does it strike with the beak or the claws? The talons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Claws, and sometimes it takes two at a time, one in each claw, and just carries them "away. "

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Have you seen any of its droppings anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. "

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you managed to hit it with your crossbow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've missed."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you're certain this is a feathered beast, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Best I can see. It's dark out here at that time of night and it looks like a bird. It doesn't "make any noise and swoops on down and takes them away and flies off in that direction."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've heard that those giant birds are attracted to red-headed, 19-year-old, scruffy-chin folk with crossbows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be with your charisma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. He goes, "Well, I don't want to be here, then. You guys can keep an eye out. I've got "to go." And unloads the bolt in the crossbow, slings it up under his arm--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a cowbell anywhere around here? I just need a cowbell. Can I borrow a cowbell from you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your kid's weird." And he keeps walking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your kid is weird!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not a child!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any cowbells on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take a glance about. You eventually can see that there is set up on one of the fences that fences in the cows, there is a cowbell, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, there's a cowbell, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. It will help the ruse. Here's my plan: we're all cows. Is that an okay plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm into this plan. But doesn't that essentially make us the bait?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we're our own bait. Are you cool with that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should one of us maybe not be a cow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, here's the thing, maybe a few of us should not be cows because only a few people are going to have the ability to turn out of being a cow once they are a cow, unless they take damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We went from all cows to pretty much no one is a cow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Keyleth is definitely a cow. No, I mean-- I didn't-- we didn't mean like that. You're very lovely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. What Vax said was way worse, earlier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you come out of being a cow, if you are one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can get rid of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You would do it? Let's do it! When else are we all going to be cows? Come on! Unless it kills them instantly, we'll be fine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm fine. I go invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to lay in wait with an arrow. All the rest of you can be cows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I'm better served waiting to strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You and me, Grog. We're cows!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it grabs one of them, I'll deal more damage. If it grabs me, I'll deal no damage. But if it grabs Scanlan cow, I can--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can turn someone else into a cow. Well, Polymorph is a concentration spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can turn us all into cows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Because you got that thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cow or no, Keyleth? Give us your answer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm a cow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeming.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, we are not actually cows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll just seem like cows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Except for me who is going to be an actual cow.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If it's Polymorph, I couldn't cast stuff. I redact my Invisibility and I'll be a cow. I'm also going to be a cow. I want to be a brown cow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all cows! Just embrace it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't change a target's body type.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the same form of your limbs-- you're right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't change size, but we can all be Grog-sized cows or Scanlan-sized cows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be an array of very strangely sized cows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan would be like a calf. Big calf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: MATT, SAM
lines.text: I'll allow it! (cheering and laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gather close to me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We want to get in the pen first, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, let's go into the pen, and if I may, I'm going to wear the cow bell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How you going to put it? I'm just going to put it around your neck right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Super loose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way into the cow pen. The little bit of moonlight that's coming down from the sky illuminates. You see the cows are clustered underneath this overhang that is used for temporary shelter. You hear this distant (mooing) as you approach and make noise. No one's not too upset yet. It's more low muttering.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if that was attraction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we use Seeming, we just appear to be cows, but we can still speak, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Anything sees you as cows--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would be like, holy shit, those are talking cows!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. What's going on? Are we turning into cows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just will seem like cows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't understand magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just go along. Go along.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That way we can ambush the bird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are going to look like cows. Are we going to look like cows to each other, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all gather around the small gnome, currently adorned with the cowbell around his neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just like the brothels, eh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mooing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (barks) Oh, wait. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're, by the way, more of a calf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are so cute, Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, shall we go interview some cows?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go talk to some cows. I want to walk over to the cows with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys step up, awkwardly, towards the cows, some of which are sleeping, some of which are noticing and sitting there just chewing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which one looks like the alpha male?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one that's got horns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no males in this pen, because they are cows.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I try to speak to the cow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What do you say?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hello, I'm Tiberius Stormwind from Draconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You speak Common. You don't know Cow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiberius, just because you look like a cow doesn't mean you can talk to the cows. The cows don't understand English. No matter if you look like a cow, they still don't understand Common.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are "cow-nsel" worthy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Speak With Animals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the best Vox Machina adventure ever! All right, you cast Speak With Animals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Actually, how many animals can I hit with Speak with Animals? It is called Animals, right? Or is it just Speak with Animal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it affects you. I think it gives you the ability to speak with.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, just me the ability?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're Dr. Doolittle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I think you're right. Okay, so I cast Speak With Animals on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Yep! On self for ten minutes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Make sure the cow-- What? She may know a cow that is over there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I go up. Is there a cluster of nice-looking ladies, sitting around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there are few that are just like (moo).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hello, ladies. Good evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (moo) Which is what you guys hear. You hear as a response: "What are you doing? We're trying "to sleep."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do apologize to awaken you. I was just curious if you could tell me a little bit about some of the events that have been transpiring around here lately? Mainly, the results of your kind getting killed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My kind?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just ask about the bird!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you seen a giant bird flying around? Anyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, all the cows start shuddering and say, "Yes. Haven't you? It keeps taking us. Why do "you think we're hiding under this?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be careful. If you stay out there, it'll see you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. Where, exactly? Where have they been-- okay. Damn, cows! It's never--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, what vital information have you learned?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll get back to you in one second. Can you tell me anything about what it looks like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's big and has wings. It's fast, and it keeps taking us."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ask her where the moon is at night--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it seem to come at a certain time of the night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The dark time."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's a cow. This is the same as before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because nothing is happening I am now trying to eat grass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bend down, and take clusters with your hand, and start eating grass.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, we are ourselves, still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are still yourselves. You just look like cows.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems totally normal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are in it, baby!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to notch a bow to my bow, just to keep a lookout to the sky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can I Prestidigitate smells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so we go out into the field.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're cows. I forgot that talking to cows never goes well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, remember Dork?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't seem to know a lot. They're simple-minded beasts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dork the ox.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, poor Dork. Dork the ox.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rest in peace, Dork.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pour a little out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way. You wait a while, a good two-hour period, as cows, before eventually you, keeping your eye to the sky with your arrow nocked, see a whisk of shadow across the moonlight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whistles)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm letting you guys fucking know there's a thing in the sky.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is it Jumanji time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not quite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you guys look up, and you see something circle once. It looks like a bird. It's just not as big as you were expecting. Looks like a bigger hawk.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Stoneskin on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bigger and bigger

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My cow is going stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for cow stealth! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're still a cow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I make myself look available. I step away from the rest of the herd a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go into a cow rage and start chewing faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would like to chew! All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Hunter's Mark it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, it has to come within range first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it swoops down, you see this bird just gets larger and larger and you realize it was quite a distance away. And now that it's getting closer, the tales you've heard are true. This is at least a 100-foot wing span, if not more.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to fix my ring on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 100-foot wing span?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As it gets close I'm going to brace my ring as it's coming towards us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Hunter's Mark on it. You have your ring ready. What you doing?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cast Slow on it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cast Slow? All righty. What is the DC on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what is the save?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it wisdom or charisma or something?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's concentration! No, wait, it is a concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it is. That's okay. I'm finding it. All right, it is wisdom. All right. Oh! What was the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. That is an 18. Rolled a natural 18 on that one. As it swoops down, you release the spell, you are immediately attempting to be grasped in its talons. That is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you then take 23 points of slashing damage to your cow form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we were just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Okay. Sorry. You're not in cow form, are you? You're illusioned. You're staying normal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm normal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're normal. Right. Okay. I thought you were saying you were doing an actual cow form, but no. All right. You take 23 points of slashing damage, and you are currently grappled as it takes right back up into the air, clutching Keyleth within its talons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How fast can the rest of us do anything? It's gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you guys can react. It is currently 60 feet away from you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I immediately-- oh god! I shoot it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have to roll for initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I was notched already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone roll initiative. You have advantage on it because you were nocked, and because you were ready to react, you have advantage on your initiative check, but everyone else just roll normally. All right. So that is 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax. Keyleth. Scanlan? Tiberius? What you guys got?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. So Vex, you're up first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot it through the Blazing Bowstring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it. Roll for the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counts quietly) 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 points of damage. All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to shoot it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That one definitely hits: 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 26 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! All right, that brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the Firebrand Warhammer, activate it, turn on the fire. And I put the Chain of Returning on it and throw it at the winged beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll with disadvantage because it's already roughly 40 to 60 feet away from you. It's tough to get there. But you can try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Due to its distance and the dark cover of night, it's harder to hit and you actually swing and throw it and the hammer-- The chain goes taut and it just drops to the ground and it's just out of range of the hammer, as it escapes the range it would have hit it with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pull it back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it. That's easy enough, it's not wedged in anything. You don't have to roll for it. All right, so that's your turn. Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to use a bonus action to click Boots of Haste together, and I think if I do that, I have two actions at that point, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Well you do have an additional action that can be used only to attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just attack. So what I want to do is click the Boots of Haste together, use the original action to run as far as I can towards the bird, and then use my final action to sneak attack the thing since it's got Keyleth in its talons. That's up to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you go for the attacks. You rush up, you dash, you get underneath it-- for a moment, because of the Boots of Haste, you keep speed with this giant, darting creature. You, underneath, throw your daggers upward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. It would just be one-- I mean if I use the dash to run as far as I can, that would leave me with one attack probably?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One attack and your bonus without the damage bonus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm trying to be a Boy Scout here. Wouldn't the Boots of Haste clicking be the bonus action? Yeah. That is 22 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. And that's not a whole lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range increment on a dagger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's ten. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dagger. Roll again for disadvantage because it's just within your secondary throwing range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. Then I missed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It vanishes into the dark night ahead of you. So yeah. That is gone. You still have your Belt of Returning, you just don't have your snake belt. Yeah, don't worry guys. I saw the look on your face and I'm like, no, it's fine. It comes back. Okay. Keyleth, you're up. You're currently grappled and held within the talons of this giant bird. You see the entire ground below you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Judging by the fairly close up appearance I have of him at this point, can I tell it is probably a "beast" nature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the sheer size, it's hard to tell. You've never encountered a beast of this size, but you do look up and you can see the talons that are currently holding you in place and piercing the sides of your armor are bird-like talons. And you do see a series of dark feathers coating the entire underbelly of this entity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to attempt to cast Dominate Beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is your Enhance Ability still active? From before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's for ability checks. So you finish casting the spell. Apparently, this entity is not affected by the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck-sticks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not a beast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not a beast. There's a fine line when certain creatures of nature are altered by some sort of magical essence or their nature perhaps is not natural at the get-go. Either they were created or over time they became something beyond beast. This seems to fall under that category.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. That brings us to its turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try and break the grapple as a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be your action to try and break the grapple. For this creature's turn, it does a full double dash of its full flight speed and is about 250 feet away from you and completely out of your guys' reach. You see it (whoosh) up into the sky, disappearing to the north, north-northwest area beyond Emon, carrying Keyleth in its claws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth, just get out of its fucking hands and fall. You can change. We'll catch you; we'll do something! Just fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're close enough where you can still hear this, as the desperation kicks in and you realize-- seeing your whole party not even visible at this point except a couple of dark dots in the low light of the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it our turn yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It now comes to Scanlan's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I Dimension Door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Dimension Door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 500 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You-- and appear where? Where do you want to appear?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On it. On its back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You appear right on its back. You immediately land and start sliding back as the wind is pushing on you. The feathers themselves, due to the aerodynamic nature of its flight path; it's a lot of wind resistance against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shush! What the hell?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I was going there. Don't worry. That's what it is. You need to go ahead and make an acrobatics check to see if you can maintain balance on the back of this beast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My intelligence is not six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to just, you tumble backward a little bit. You grab a couple of feathers and get yourself just on the side underneath where the wing meets part of the upper torso, where the wind resistance is the least amount, and you manage to hold on. You are now clutching the back of this giant bird. That's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. As my bonus action, I will inspire Keyleth. Right? She's right next to me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan? What the shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) The way you kick so much ass like nobody else. The way you do animal things gets me overwhelmed. You don't know. You don't know you're powerful. Oh. That's what makes you powerful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Due to the wind, you don't hear the last line. It's too loud around it. However, you can take a d10 inspiration dice.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a heroic move! Amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which for the record, this currently right now looks like-- you see the cow clutched below, and currently there is a cow holding onto this giant bird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It lasts eight hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn. Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Fly, you fools! And go right after them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. All of you guys, at that point you see Tiberius and you all take off after him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The cows take off into the night sky.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (shouting) Fly, Vox Machina! Moo!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vox "Moo-china!" (booing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the flying speed on Fly?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet. Cool.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to dash. On that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. You guys can go 120 feet every turn. It can go 240. Two rounds pass before you guys realize there is no way you're going to catch up with this thing or get even close to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got Haste!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got Hunter's Mark on it, so I can track it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double me, yo! I got Haste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're only at the speed that the arcane nature of the spell can take you. I'm just saying. Your metabolism's real fast. Your heartbeat's hummingbirding it. But you're still only going 120 feet. So as you guys follow behind, you can see now, after a while on the edge of the shoreline, not too far from Emon-- maybe what would normally be from horseback or a brisk walk, a half day's travel-- you eventually come upon the-- There it is! You come upon the coastal mountains known as the Shoreline Summit. It's a series of unusually steep mountain bluffs that hug the coastline, northwest of Emon. As you get closer, and at this point you've lost sight of the bird. Scanlan, I want you to go ahead and roll an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not good. Athletics? 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you get closer to these mountaintops--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have a turn yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ahead and take your turn now too, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah? I cast Polymorph on it. You're on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry about me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Haven't you guys learned that by now? I'm fine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is what she cries out heroically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the DC on this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My spell DC? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a cow on a cow with a cow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan and Keyleth both are just falling. You guys don't see this. It's too far away from you now. At this point, you're probably close to about 500 feet in the air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yo, I heard you liked cows, so I gave you some cows with your cow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you guys are now both plummeting and falling at a really, really rapid speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go eagle form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flailing cows. You go eagle form. You're fine. So you go into eagle form. That's your action this turn. That's your bonus action, because you can do that as a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As a bonus action!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eagle form. Scanlan, you plummet full speed on this one. You probably have another two rounds before you impact with something very painful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he's as heavy as a dust mote, so he just goes like this all the way down. Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think that's how it works.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, he's a little pebble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can catch him, if you need catched.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you see this giant thing just go and vanish from sight. It's just gone. It just disappeared.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I go full Gandalf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never go full Gandalf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are pushing forward. So it's now the next round for you guys to react. What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will become a pterodactyl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're casting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Polymorph on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Because you are falling and this is a lot of wind, I'm going to have to ask you to make a concentration check to complete the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll a d20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a concentration not on holding a spell, but on casting it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Because as part of the components of it and maintaining your attention to the spell--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does he add? His spell attack bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This? No, this is a d20 and-- let me make sure, yeah-- it's a d20 and then you add your plus five from your charisma.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that-- (screeches) pterodactyl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tables have turned, motherfucker! Tables have turned!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're both flying cows!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! Was Seeming a concentration?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think it lasts for like eight hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it drop? Are we no longer cows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so. I'll check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey! You're not a cow anymore!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, you're not a cow anymore!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! Awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys keep flying. You guys catch yourselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, not concentration. It just lasts for eight hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As the twins are flying, I say, hey, did you notice we have the same pattern? Twins!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About this time, you hear a loud, impactful boom. And there's a cloud of dust partway into the side of this first bit of mountain range that you come upon, a little bit distant from you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I fly down towards it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start heading in that direction. Because of the speed it was traveling at and the way it was carrying at the speed it was going, it's still ahead of you guys. And you see the impact. You hear this loud screeching sound and you see now where there was a little poof of cloud, these wings unfold and (flapping) make its way back up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How far away from it are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys right now at the close to six minutes you've been traveling--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it not drop the cow to 0 hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the damage carries over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The remainder of that damage went into its hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From you Tiberius, it's probably close to 700 to 800 feet away from you. It's because of the speed it was traveling and the speed you guys were following. It was gaining on you every single turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it flying away from us now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's heading up into the mountain range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fly after that motherfucker!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we still track it? It's still nighttime, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still nighttime, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's only 500 feet away from me right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 600 to 500 feet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, cool. Well I'm going for it, still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all following it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where am I? It's taking off right now and I'm over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're back here. It's now starting to take off and head up towards the top of this mountain range that you're just starting to come upon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. If it's doing that, then I'll fucking go higher and try to meet it where it's going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cool. The rest of you guys continue to give chase. Now that it's returned to its form, it travels an additional double dash: 240 feet. As this progresses, it's far beyond any of you guys in a matter of seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the mountain range really far away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you've just hit the outskirts of the mountain range. It got there first. You guys just catch up to where it starts and you see it's like now it's dodging through the mountains and is currently no longer in sight. There is a little bit of low cloud cover in this area. A couple drift by and cover a couple of the mountains. But this little cluster of seaside cliffs and mountains, as you get closer, you can see it's dotted with high altitude trees. There's precariously perched goats that are sleeping on elements of the sides of this mountain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you track it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can track it! Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're keeping your attention on it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The winds also are pretty strong as you get close to the mountains. As you coast around each, you start actually diving into this middle valley area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that affect any spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it just makes us stealth easier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't drop Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it concentration?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait. (laughs) I don't know if I can tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is Pass Without a Trace concentration?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where does it say it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a C next to it somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, never mind! It's a concentration. Forget it! I don't know how these things work yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, stick to the bows and arrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Traveling through this area, you can see the mountains. The way that they're constructed in this area, it's not a gradual crag. A lot of these are just punched up in the air, like whatever heavy seismic force that created these initially was very localized and very powerful. A lot of the mountains are spire-like. They come up with very sheer sides and you can see why this mountain range is largely not utilized or traversed or generally spoken of often because it's too dangerous for most average folk to even attempt to climb or use for any good reason. The winds are high and powerful here at the tops, as well. And as you're flying around, the winds blowing across, and you get pushed off your course a little bit here and there, but you still keep up, best as possible. You leading the charge. Over about five minutes of searching through this mountain range, you sense that its movement eventually comes to stop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a nest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you sense that he came to a stop?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He came to a stop a little bit ahead of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go get him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we all try to stealth in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a pterodactyl, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go for the element of surprise. Well, technically, we're all still cows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. And you guys cannot talk because you're actually in creature forms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Well, I'm going to try to stealth. Mountains are my favored terrain!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are! Do you want to go onto the mountain itself, or are you still flying amongst them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'll still fly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you would not get the advantage because air is not your favored terrain. So everyone who wishes to, go ahead and roll stealth checks

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you who wish to try and come at it from a quiet--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (pterodactyl screech)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With advantage, I rolled a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not used to being flying, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are we flying anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all still flying, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, shit. Okay. Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so. You guys following behind Vex, many of you clumsily and some of you shouting out to each other, "I think she sees it this way." And you're like, "oh my god." You come around this one bend and you can see one of the larger mountainous spires that has a lot of trees and green growth towards the top at certain places where the rock juts out and gives a shelf for such greenery to grow, outside of its sheer outside surface. You do see a couple of wings fold in against the moonlight in what looks to be an outcropping. And there are multiple layers of rock shelves on the side of this mountain. And on one of these outcroppings, there appears to be some sort of a nest: a cluster of almost like actual trees and pieces of wood that are all jammed into this giant nest that's nestled against where the shadow and the moonlight are fighting for some sort of visual on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big-ass tree fortress.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we just find like a mama bird and baby birds?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to take out the mom and train the babies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we going to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We're going to capture those babies and we're going to train them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's a good idea. I like that idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Avatar?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could go in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me go in? There's a giant fucking nest here! I get close to it. As close as I feel safe getting to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all stay back or do you go with her?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to cast Greater Invisibility on myself and then follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys have 12 seconds before you all plummet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh wait! No! I don't do that. Damn it! I forget we're still flying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What part of the flying part did you forget?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I thought we'd landed already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys all going with Vex, or are you all staying back and she's going on her own?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going to lose Fly, or do we keep it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you casting Greater Invisibility?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then no, you're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it the same stealth roll or an additional stealth roll to go forward at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No this was your stealth roll on approaching.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, I mean, I knew I rolled shitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know you rolled shitty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gliding cows, drifting through the night sky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hoof in hoof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeping too much of a distance would be a bad thing. You come upon the underneath portion of this outcropping, and you can see within a quick glance-- go ahead and make a perception check, all of you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you who are coming up in this cluster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get an advantage because we're in a mountain environment at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Actually no. Because you're seeing things on a mountain, I will give you advantage on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the highest was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. You got?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all look up, it's very shadowy over here. It's hard to see. The moonlight's in your eye a little bit and the darkness is so pitch. The umbra of this particular shadow is very dark and crushed. You make out, in the nest, the large bird creature has folded its wings and is currently leaning down. And you see something in the nest that's much smaller moving up next to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to kill a mama.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she's killing the farmers' stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can transplant her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To a wildlife preserve?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe. And her babies?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Capture her and move her away from town?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That seems complicated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they on the highest peak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one just is one of the largest outcroppings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to swoop up over them. See if there's any boulders to drop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking over it, there are no loose rocks or boulders. In fact, because of the construction of these mountains, they're solid spires that jut up and then abruptly end. All the erosion that happens here appears to be gradual enough-- that's why the sides of the mountains are so smooth and unclimbable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there's a sheer peak and they're nested on the side of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a sheer peak that rounds off at the very top and there are little outcroppings that jut out in places as it goes down. But those are more towards the top, and as you go down further-- as most of the erosion hits the mountain lower and lower, it has carved off or destroyed most of what would have been previous outcroppings, or smoothed them over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away are we now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are probably a good 60 or 50 feet if you're trying to get up within range of your Fly. Right? What's the range of on that? Fly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fly? Oh, here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got it. No! There is no range on it. You just touch them. So you're fine. Yeah. As long as you're concentrating on it, you're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we're within 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you guys have been keeping a little more of a distance down here. However, at this point, as you guys are all encroaching and Scanlan's gone overhead, a voice rings out against the darkness, "Flying cows? Really? I care not for this insolence. If you've come to mock me or fight "me, do it now! Or leave this creature alone!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Where are you? Who are you? Who said that?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I rolled an arcana check of 17 of my surroundings-- where it's coming from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ditto. I try to perceive where it's coming from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's nothing arcane in nature to it. It's in the shadow. You can't really see it from this distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it in front of us? To the side of us? Is it coming from where the bird seems to be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's coming from where the bird is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's controlling it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fly over as an eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You still look like a cow eagle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we drop Seeming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not under your control, and you can't talk, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I yell out, you've been stealing the farmers' livestock. Give us a reason not to kill you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good. That's good. Diplomacy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Or, I mean, moo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys are all keeping distance from it? The voice comes out again, "Your nature "confuses me and your words seem ill-informed. If you're not going to come to speak of discourse, "I'm going to assume that that you're my enemy."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Then, as he's saying that, I'll approach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Tiberius cow goes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And as I approach the thing, I'm going to Dispel Magic on myself.

lines.name: MATT
